title: AdClub
introduction: Boston University's professional quality, student-driven advertising agency. We blend strategic insights, creative risks, and fresh perspectives to craft bold campaigns for our broad range of clients. Our agency fosters career development through hands-on learning and mentorship, preparing students to excel in advertising and beyond. Open to all, regardless of experience or major, we create real work with real results. Interested in joining? Check us out on our socials or email us today!

title: Accounting Association
introduction: Bridging the gap between the academic and professional worlds, the BU Accounting Association sponsors events that bring the industry to the classroom. Highlights include student internship panels, company information sessions, mock interviews, resume workshops, CPA Becker panels, office tours, and more.

title: Adopted and Multicultral Student Organization
introduction: The Adopted and Multicultural Student Alliance (AMSA) is a student-led community for adoptees, members of adoptive families, and anyone interested in learning about adoptive experiences and the multicultural identity that often accompanies. This community aims to connect members and provide opportunities for personal development and growth through discussions, social and cultural events, and giving back to the community.  Originally founded as the International Adoptee Club in 2021, we have expanded our mission to reflect the diverse community that falls under the large umbrella of adoption, including domestic, international, interracial, foster care, or open adoption to name a few. Our mission is to create a welcoming community where members can connect, share experiences, and explore the adoptive identity. title: (Kasual)Kicks Soccer Club
introduction: Pickup soccer? Casual games? Watch Parties? This is the club for you! PS: Check out our instagram kasualkicksbu for more information! The players behind Kasual Kicks believe that soccer is more than just a game; we believe it's a way to connect, learn, and grow. Through our events, such as recreational games, watch parties, twilight soccer games, and more, we strive to cultivate a community of soccer enthusiasts of ALL skill levels where they can engage in the sport they love, share their passion for soccer, and foster growth through teamwork and friendly competition. Kasual Kicks is DEDICATED to creating a welcoming environment for players from beginner to advanced. Our mission is to create a community where soccer serves as a bridge for people to meet and get to know eachtoehr through their common love of soccer. This focus on recreational play rather than intense competition offers a balanced and enjoyable experience for students looking to stay active, have fun and meet people.

title: Albanian Student Association
introduction: The Albanian Student Association is a club in which enriches the already diverse campus of Boston University by bringing together students of Albanian descent or those interested in learning Albanian culture, history, and contemporary issues. The Albanian community is very tightly knit and we believe that students should be able to experience this patriotic and family-oriented environment. We look to provide students from all over the world a place that they can call home, where we provide relationships, advice, and much more.
